headline: How FICO’s New US$1.50 Billion Buyback and Mortgage Tools Push Deeper Into Lending Ecosystem
summary: In February 2026, Fair Isaac Corporation (FICO) completed a US$1.00 billion repurchase of 642,028 shares under its June 2025 authorization, closed that plan, and the Board approved a new US$1.50 billion share buyback while myFICO launched a Mortgage Score Simulator for Premier subscribers. Together with FICO’s new MeridianLink partnership in mortgage credit workflows, these moves underscore the company’s focus on deepening its role across the mortgage lending ecosystem while returning...
